content: Hi! I'm Eric Gonzalez, an aerospace engineer with excellent problem solving skills and strong foundations of mathematics, physics and computer science fascinated by the power of the digital revolution the world is experiencing and willing to work hard on it.  Currently looking for an internship/entry-level job in areas related to big data, data science, machine learning, industry 4.0 or internet of things.
